channel.title: Lucky Sevens Trophy
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Lucky Sevens Trophy" - Not so Lucky?

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: Only spent ~350k on 5 lines at a time, so I'm not nearly as frustrated as other players. Here's to perseverance and hope….

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: The theme is kinda useless :/

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded:
Finally got it :D

After only 50k this season but well over 2 million overall.

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: I have spent over 2 million ryo on the jackpot and I still don't have the trophy.

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: 918000 And I finally got one.

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: about 99k for the first, and at 180k i got another one.

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: So far I've spent 449,500 Ryo and no luck. Most I've won was about 10k I think.

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: i got this about 4 or 5 days ago and I also won the big board and a claymore on the same day ^_^

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: got it 3 days ago spent 8k

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: Just so you know, 2 mill isnt that much compared to people trying for it. Last season i spent a little over 3.5 mill and didnt get it. I know somebody else that has spent about 5.8 mill and not got it. But congratz anyways.

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: Total Spent for Trophy:2,068,975

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: OMFG! I GOT IT! I GOT! I spun about 15-20 times since that post and i got it! At first i was about to click again and i noticed it WASNT a exploding tag! I WAS LIKE….MOTHER F'er! I was gonna shit my pants i still am i think…

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: Ok listen up. North got it easy so people who say they spent 400k and "I still aint gotz nothin yet. I spends sos much to gt 7 thing" STFU! IM ON 2mil as of now. I drop about 150k a day for it and nothing, but crappy 50ks and 10ks…

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: Ive won 5…3 on 1 alt 2 on another but my main has spent a ton and still hasnt got it. 2 mills and 3 100ks

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded:
In total? I've spent over 1.4mil.
None of the hangout themes, no Lucky Sevens, highest winnings amount to 40k.
Three BARs, I think. -_-

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: 413750 ryo this season (not to mention the amount from my last two seasons, which i can't remember) and the highest prize i've ever gotten is 10,000 ryo. *shrugs* oh well, i'm going to get it this season if it kills me.

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded:
The average cost to get the Sevens trophy is exactly the same regardless of whether you play 1 line or 5.

HOWEVER, playing all 5 lines does open the possibility of that 1,000,000 ryo, which increases that average return of the game (which isn't horribly bad to begin with).

Point: You should always play with all 5 lines on, but don't expect it to get you the Sevens Trophy any sooner.

Anyway, I got my trophy in Season 1, after spending ~~ 400k at the wheel. (Although most of that was ryo I won back from it.)

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: Even though I have yet to win the item myself, I find it best to use all 5 lines, simply because it increases your odd slightly. Sure, it uses up more ryo, but you knew it was gonna cost lots of ryo to begin with to keep taking the chance at getting this elusive prize.

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: is it better to do all 5 lines or just 1 if you are trying to get the trophy. i know you get 1 mill instead of 100k ryu for winning but does it take more ryu to get triple 7's that way

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded:
Still successfully being the unluckiest person at the slots, (even though I am in "Lucky Village").

Total Jackpot Ryo Spent:6208200 and still no Lucky Sevens

Am I even anywhere close to being the person who has spent the most ryo on the slots in one season and still no lucky sevens…..?

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: I got it in my third try playing the game for the first time lol

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: spent 300k trying to get it last season, gave up, and spent about 10k this season and got it with my last shot :P

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: I have two sevens trophies ^_^

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded:
Wow i feel like the unluckiest person in BvS (even though I am in "Lucky Village"), at the end of the day I spend all my ryo on the slots to no avail.

Total Jackpot Ryo Spent:5350700 and still no Lucky Sevens

Am I even anywhere close to being the person who has spent the most ryo on the slots in one season and still no lucky sevens…..?

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded:
yea, their average is bullcrap. its not anywhere near 150-200k

I spent about 1.3 mil to get it and i consider myself lucky
Kagir spent 1.8 mil and was about to murder someone.

but how on EARTH do you spend 4mil on the slots?!

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded:
Current Ryo: 1859
Total Jackpot Ryo Spent:4058200

And no Sevens Trophy!!!

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: Having the Hotsumoto/Vanilla team doesn't increase your chances of winning. It only increases your ryo payout by 10%.

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded:
what does the hotsumoto & vanilla team do? spent 2500.
Just starting, so yeah. Haven't got it. Sorrow.

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: Got one a couple of days ago at 1,365,750 Ryo. (Got Pinky's theme as well the same day.) I feel like that figure really ought to be a multiple of 500.

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: 2872450 ryo spent and still no lucky sevens trophy, very very hard…. I even used the hotsumoto and vanilla team

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy

i got it today :P
Row 1 Won! 100000 Ryo! You Won an Item: Sevens Trophy!

item.content:encoded: I am very unlucky. Last season i spent 645,000 Ryo and no sevens! i so could of used that money for other things than waste it and end up with 500 kunai. lol

I also spent around 150.000 Ryo in Season 1.

item.content:encoded:
spent over 600k last season - only won a decent thing twice. Bar's and Cherries

personally I think the slots are a crock

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: It gives a very handy theme and +10 stamina.

why spend so much ryo on something that gets u 100000 ryo?
your spending like 500000 o_O

580,000 ryo!

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded:
I am at 488,000 ryo thus far and still no luck…
It does not bode well for me that folks are saying they hit 800,000 without getting it…
(and yes, I have enough spent at other party house locations to make the theme… I was just REALLY hoping that the odds might change of winning at a certain spending level, but it sounds like… no)
-Hino, of Hiro Gama

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded:
I just got the trophy today. Total spent on the slots to get it? 896,000 ryo.

I thought I would never get it.

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: Heh. Just spent 300k in one go on slots. Absolutely nothing at all

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: 500k on one character and no luck … I just looped, so I suppose I'll try again at some point when I have no better use for the ryo.

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
item.content:encoded: 21500 ryo for Tsubani. With the remaining ryo for the Theme coming from the Wheel. A much more lucrative way IMO, you can sell the junk and sometimes get really neat items, if not the super rare.

item.title: Re: Lucky Sevens Trophy
